title: 1.3 Master Challenge 2
question: An organization is starting a new office with three departments: sales, engineering,and finance. Each department has different connectivity requirements and security levels. The sales department requires frequent communication with the engineering department, while the finance department needs to have limited access to other departments for security reasons. Choose the appropriate network topology for this situation and justify your choice
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
